data.decision: Duro 2026 Roadmap: 5 phases over 28 weeks. Phase 0-1 (Wk 1-8): Foundation + wow demo + public launch. Phase 2 (Wk 9-12): Pro $19/mo. Phase 3 (Wk 13-20): Team $39/user. Phase 4 (Wk 21-24): Compass Score dashboard. Phase 5 (Wk 25-28): Enterprise prep.
data.rationale: Synthesized from competitive analysis (60+ products), business model v2 (trust-first GTM), and operationalized Builder's Compass. Prioritizes wow demo first, trust features before cloud sync, GitHub integration for stickiness.
